commit.message:
change py.test references to pytest

as of 3.0, pytest is the preferred binary
See: https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/changelog.html#id1033
> "Introduce pytest command as recommended entry point."

Add internal __pytest_repeat_step_number fixture lazily (#40)

This helps with having pytest-repeat installed with pytest's own tests
(and not using it).

older versions.

commit.message: Update HTTPS links
Update supported Python versions

Move step number to the end of the parametrisation ID

This allows to sort test results on the report tool (Jenkins, Allure)
with grouping by test name, not by step number.

commit.message:
Add repeat-scope parameter

This parameter allows to change test execution order.
For example, with `--repeat-scope session` all tests executes
first time, next all tests executes second time and etc.
Updated change log for v0.5.0
